fast3d.simple.shapes

Class GeometricBodyBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.simple.shapes.GeometricBodyBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Box, Cone, Cylinder, Sphere

    public abstract class GeometricBodyBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    base class for constructing groups of triangles or AdvTriangles (depending on what field you set (material or color)) that make up the shape of a geometric body (a box or cone for instance)
    at least setMaterial(Material) XOR setColor() has to be set (if both are set than color is ignored)
    multiple builds are independent to one another
    at last, when all attributes are set, call build() to create a Group of the specified shape
    subclasses are meant to build the shapes around Vector3d.zero() (as the groups center) and by default of size (diameter) 1d
    Author:
    Tim Trense

      • setMaterial

        public void setMaterial(Color average)
        to set if the resulting geometric body has to be made out of AdvTriangles
        the emissive color will be black, shininess = 25 and alpha = opaque
        Parameters:
        average - the average materials color (ambient, diffuse, specular)

      • setColor

        to set if the resulting geometric body has to be made out of simple Triangles
        Parameters:

      • build

        public Group build()
        constructs a group that makes up the specified body
        multiple calls make multiple groups independent to each other
        Returns:
        the specified shape or null if setMaterial() or setColor() where not called
